document_data.name: Ashoka
document_data.mainbody: '''Kepeshkmolik Ashoka''' was a [[dragonborn]] member of [[Clan Kepeshkmolik]]. She was the last living daughter of [[Kepeshkmolik Thymara]] in [[1486 DR]]. She also was a direct descendant of [[Shasphur]].
document_data.Description: Ashoka had one dark eye and one silver eye. Her scales were pale coppery-brown, and she had white plumes.
document_data.History: In [[1486 DR]], Ashoka requested to talk with [[Farideh]], in order to give her the [[Black Axe of the Moon's Champion]], and in doing so, fulfilling the promise her mother had made to [[Sel√ªne]].
